posts.name: Bangkok Golden - Falls Church, VA
posts.note: No-frills spot for Thai and Laotian dishes that also offers lunch and dinner buffets.

posts.name: Blue and White Carry Out - Alexandria
posts.note: The Blue and White Carry Out only shack where you can get an egg and cheese breakfast sandwich on toasted white bread for under $2 or a pork chop sandwich for about $3.50.

posts.name: Bob and Edith's - Columbia Pike
posts.note: Old-school diner serving American comfort food 24/7 to everyone from hipsters to families.

posts.name: Dairy Godmother - Del Ray, VA (Temporarily Closed)
posts.note: Retro-style parlor dishing up unusual flavors of homemade frozen custard and sorbet.

posts.name: Knotty Pine Restaurant - Front Royal, VA
posts.note: Longtime local haunt offering classic American grub, including breakfast, plus a back bar area.

posts.name: Peter Chang - Arlington, VA
posts.note: Cult chef Peter Chang serves his Sichuan playbook and special dishes at this spiffed-up storefront.

posts.name: Pho 75 Arlington, VA
posts.note: Traditional pho with a wide choice of add-ons served in a modest setting. Cash only.

posts.name: Ray's Hell Burger
posts.note: Unassuming spot for hamburgers with gourmet add-ons, steak & cheese sandwiches, boozy shakes and more.

posts.name: Sugar Shack Donuts - Alexandria, VA
posts.note: This offshoot of the Richmond original specializes in handmade donuts with unique glazes and toppings.

posts.name: Taco Bamba - Falls Church, VA
posts.note: Colorful, counter-serve storefront dishing up Mexican eats for takeout or quick stand-up dining.

posts.name: Taqueria Mexicana - Shen-valley Flea Market (White Post, VA)
posts.note: You can get authentic Mexican tacos with contents like lengua (tongue), tripe, pork, beef, chicken, tortas, and many other things.
